response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe would significantly enhance and transform your business operations. This extraordinary opportunity comes with a value proposition of $950,000, offering an exceptional return on investment. Given its worth of $1,000,000 to you, this offer represents a unique chance to secure a valuable asset at a competitive price. I look forward to discussing the details and understanding how we can facilitate a smooth transaction. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 950000}
